content:
Hi Jordan,

Thanks. Resolved

Kind regards,
Alex James
CTO

Hi Alex,

This is a friendly follow-up on the below query. Should you still need any assistance, feel free to reply.

Kind regards,
Jordan B
Product Specialist

Hi Alex,

Thank you for your chat yesterday. As discussed, kindly grant us view-only access to the company to take a look. To give the Support team access:

  • Log into Dummy Pay.
  • Ensure that you are in the company that you need to grant access to by checking that the correct company name appears in the top left-hand corner of the screen. Switch companies if you need to by clicking on the switch link that appears when hovering the mouse next to the company name. Alternatively, go to the Profile icon and click on Companies.
  • Once youâ€™re in the correct company, click on the Help icon (question mark) in the top right-hand corner and select Support.
  • Scroll down to the Grant Access button and click on it.

Once done, please advise the name of the company and employee shared along with the period you are referring to?

Looking forward to your feedback.

Kind regards,
Jordan B
Product Specialist
